name: tophat_cufflinks_rnaseq
title: RNA-Seq Analysis Pipeline
summary: Maps RNA-Seq data and assesses expression using Tophat/Cufflinks toolkit

inputSpec.name: reads
inputSpec.label: Reads
inputSpec.help: One or more reads objects to be mapped and have their expression levels counted.

inputSpec.name: indexed_reference
inputSpec.label: Indexed Reference
inputSpec.help: Bowtie2 indexed version of the Reference Genome.  If not provided it will be generated.  Providing it skips this computationally intensive step.

inputSpec.name: gene_model
inputSpec.label: Gene Model
inputSpec.help: Gene model to use during both mapping and expression quantification.  This is an object of type 'Genes'

inputSpec.name: output_name
inputSpec.label: Output Name
inputSpec.help: Results files will named based on this string

inputSpec.name: tophat_options
inputSpec.label: Tophat Options
inputSpec.help: This string will be given to the tophat mapper as is and should be used for passing command line arguments.

inputSpec.name: cufflinks_options
inputSpec.label: Cufflinks Options
inputSpec.help: This string will be given to the cufflinks expression quantifying program as is and should be used for passing command line arguments.

outputSpec.name: transcripts
outputSpec.label: Expression Levels
outputSpec.help: Transcripts table containing FPKM values, derived from the genes.fpkm_tracking file.

outputSpec.name: cufflinks_output
outputSpec.label: Cufflinks Outputs
outputSpec.help: File object, called cufflinks_output.tar.gz, which is a compressed archive of all files output by cufflinks. Useful for downstream analysis of expression values.

details.upstreamAuthor: Cole Trapnell, Ben Langmead, Daehwan Kim, Geo Pertea, Harold Pimentel, Ryan Kelley, Lior Pachter, Steven Salzberg, Adam Roberts, Brian Williams, Ali Mortazavi, Gordon Kwan, Jeltje van Baren, Barbara Wold
